item.description:
Members of rock and ice climbing boston- Join the American Alpine Club and the Western Mass Climbers Coalition in Hadley, MA (near Amherst) at the annual indoor and outdoor climbing competition + reel rock film tour!

All the information is here http://www.climbgneiss.org/index.php/

Western Mass Climbing meetup at Central Rock Gym and Wendel State Forest.

Advance tickets can be purchased online or at the Central Rock Gym, Hadley for a discounted price of $20.
Tickets will also be available on the day of the event for $25.
Tickets for the REEL ROCK Film only can be purchased at the Central Rock Gym, Hadley for $10.

Bonus Event - Adopt-a-Crag on Sept. 30 with WMCC!
We have an Adopt-A-Crag event scheduled for Sunday and welcome you to join us! We'll put in a bunch of hours working on trails and have a great time! More info to follow here as well as at the Rendezvous.
item.name: Reelrock Film + Climbing Competition with the AAC / WMCC in Hadley, MA
